name: No Rope for You - Nonsense Game Jam
name_original: No Rope for You - Nonsense Game Jam
description:
Nonsense Game Jam: Week #1

Theme: Rope

This game was built  as a part of the first run of Nonsense Game Jam, a jam between myself and a few friends where we will be working on our gamedev skills.

The theme of this Jam was rope, and I implemented the rope in the best way possible. They don't work, well, they kinda do, but my poor wizard doesn't have sleeves so he can't use them. I had a good time getting back into development with this game, and I used a new game engine to build this, swapping from Unity last semester to Godot for this project. I look forward to the following weeks of gamedev!

Controls:

A/Left Arrow: Left

D/Right Arrow: Right

W/Up Arrow: Jump
